overview:
Rodrigo Valin is the whiz behind Tubalooâ€™s application development, paying homage to his extensive experience and knowledge of Google Android, SQL, Python and Java. Rodrigo is responsible for the cutting edge software and innovative underlying architecture that allows Tubaloo to stand apart from others in the telecom industry.

Rodrigo is an active developer in the Asterisk community and a contributor to the Astbill open source project.

Prior to joining Tubaloo, Rodrigo served as Chief Developer at Xurros SA where he developed a Linux based point of sale, inventory and report system for the growing food company.

Rodrigo studied computer science and engineering at Catholic University of ValparaÃ­so in Chile and also holds a technical degree in computer programming from Santa Maria University.
